chat_history.message:
Hello,

My product iPhone 12 mini has the above problem:

Hello everyone, I ordered the iPhone 12 mini in excellent quality like new. Unfortunately, my delivered device only has a maximum charging capacity of 84%. That's not what I expected from a device labeled as 'like new'. I've already purchased several refurbished iPhones and always received devices with 100% charging capacity under this rating. I generally support this sustainable variant.

Unfortunately, I couldn't see the status of the device until it was set up, otherwise I would have sent the device back immediately. I also ordered screen protectors and cases parallel to my phone order.

Please let me know how we can find a satisfying solution together. 
Best regards,
Frank Nürnberger

Thank you for your help,

Dear ecomobile

The customer says:

Hello everyone, I ordered the iPhone 12 mini in Excellent as new quality. Unfortunately, the device I received only has a maximum charging capacity of 84%.
I did not expect this for a device "like new". I have already ordered refurbished iPhones several times and have always received devices with 100% charging capacity in this classification. I am also fundamentally in favour of this sustainable option.
Unfortunately, I could only see the status of the device after it had been set up, otherwise I would have sent it back immediately. I also ordered screen protectors and covers at the same time as ordering the mobile phone.
Please let me know how we can find a satisfactory solution together
Yours sincerely
Frank Nürnberger

Regards,
Filiz from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare, please relay the following message to the customer.

We are truly sorry that you were not satisfied by our product. Rather than sending a return, would you consider a 30 euros commercial gesture instead? This helps to save the harmful carbon dioxide emissions generated by logistics carriers to facilitate a return of a device without hardware issues?

Thank you. 

Regards,
JY

Dear ecomobile

The customer has written:
I would be prepared to accept such a gesture, but would be happy to receive €50 so that I can order a new battery. Then I would carry out the replacement myself

Regards,
Filiz from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

Unfortunately, the highest amount of commercial gesture that we can give to the customer is 30 euros. Can I double check with whether the customer is agreeable to this amount. Thank you for your patience.

Regards,
CH
